summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SkillFlow Resource Assignment and Release features. All 5 requested features are working correctly: 1) SDC Creation assigns infrastructure resource (marks as in_use), 2) SDC Creation assigns manager resource (marks as assigned), 3) Work Order completion API releases all resources, 4) 'Complete & Release Resources' button appears for active work orders, 5) Resources summary shows available vs assigned counts correctly.
passed_tests: GET /api/resources/summary returns correct counts (trainers, managers, infrastructure)
Initial resources all show as 'available' status
Completing already completed work order returns appropriate message
Resource summary updates correctly after assignment operations
GET /api/master/work-orders/{id} returns work order with SDCs created
'Complete & Release Resources' button visible for active work orders
'Completed' badge shown for completed work orders (no complete button)
SDC Creation dialog shows 'Select Center from Resources' section
SDC Creation dialog shows 'Select Center Manager' section with available count
Resources tab shows correct summary: '2 Trainers (2 available)', '2 Center Managers (2 available)', '2 SDC/Centers (2 available)'
updated_files: /app/backend/tests/test_resource_assignment.py - Created new test file for resource assignment/release APIs
seed_data_creation: Test user created with HO role. Database has: 2 trainers (available), 2 managers (available), 2 infrastructure (available), 4 master work orders (1 completed during testing, 3 active).
context_for_next_testing_agent: All resource assignment and release features are working. The complete_master_work_order endpoint (POST /api/master/work-orders/{id}/complete) successfully releases trainers, managers, and infrastructure. The frontend shows 'Complete & Release Resources' button for active work orders and 'Completed' badge for completed ones. SDC creation form integrates with resource masters - shows available infrastructure filtered by district and available managers.

sdc_creation_assigns_infrastructure.details: POST /api/resources/infrastructure/{id}/assign marks resource as 'in_use' with assigned_work_order_id. Frontend calls this API after SDC creation when infrastructure is selected.

sdc_creation_assigns_manager.details: POST /api/resources/managers/{id}/assign marks manager as 'assigned' with assigned_sdc_id. Frontend calls this API after SDC creation when manager is selected.

work_order_completion_releases_resources.details: POST /api/master/work-orders/{id}/complete releases all trainers (status: available, assigned_sdc_id: null), managers (status: available, assigned_sdc_id: null), and infrastructure (status: available, assigned_work_order_id: null). Returns count of released resources.

complete_button_for_active_work_orders.details: 'Complete & Release Resources' button with green checkmark icon appears for active work orders. Button is hidden for completed work orders, replaced by 'Completed' badge.

resources_summary_shows_counts.details: Resources tab shows summary cards: '2 Trainers (2 available)', '2 Center Managers (2 available)', '2 SDC/Centers (2 available)'. Counts update correctly after assignment/release operations.
